summary: SummaryFeaturing a creamy texture that transforms into a generous foam upon contact with water, LA MOUSSE thoroughly removes pollution, sunscreen and traces of makeup, without compromising skin. The complexion is left feeling fresher and more comfortable. Barrier function is preserved for up to 24 hours*.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsComposed of up to 91%** naturally derived ingredients, LA MOUSSE is infused with the House’s emblematic flower, the camellia.Camellia ceramides help strengthen skin’s barrier and lock in hydration.Obtained from frozen Gaujacq camellia petals through hydrodistillation, camellia water leaves skin with a sensation of freshness.Research Results*Instrumental evaluation of 20 people **According to the ISO 16128 standard Caution: Avoid contact with the eye area. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately. Do not store at extreme temperatures.Item 2641305How To UseApply LA MOUSSE every morning and evening. To enhance the experience, CHANEL has developed LE GESTE ULTRA MOUSSE. Dispense a small amount into your palm, add water and work into a lather. Apply to the entire face. Perform small circular movements with your fingertips. Using your palms, make wide circular movements on the cheeks, forehead and chin. Rinse and pat skin dry with a clean towel.IngredientsAqua (Water), Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Lauric Acid, Camellia Japonica Flower Water, Potassium Hydroxide, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Tribehenin, Myristic Acid, Glycol Distearate, Ceramide Np, Phytosphingosine, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Potassium Sorbate, Lauryl Glucoside, Polyquaternium-7, Sodium Hydroxide, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Phytic Acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sodium Citrate, BS000428A.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply LA MOUSSE every morning and evening. To enhance the experience, CHANEL has developed LE GESTE ULTRA MOUSSE. Dispense a small amount into your palm, add water and work into a lather. Apply to the entire face. Perform small circular movements with your fingertips. Using your palms, make wide circular movements on the cheeks, forehead and chin. Rinse and pat skin dry with a clean towel.

reviews.headline: I would buy again!
reviews.comments: I received the LA MOUSSE Camellia cleansing cream to foam and I would like to start by saying alittle bit of the product goes along way ! It leaves my skin feeling refreshed and leaves no redness at all. I will definitely repurchase again and recommend to my family& friends!

reviews.headline: Great for your double wash
reviews.comments:
I received the La Mousse Camelia Cream to Foam Cleanser as a gift from CHANEL in exchange of my honest opinion.

First and foremost, I like that you get a lot of product and enjoy the light fragrance and texture of the creamy cleanser. The foaming isn't significant- actually, mine didn't really foam at all, but I have richer mineral water where I live, so this can be the issue with lack of foaming.

It has been great for using after a long day of make up. It is sensitive enough to use for a double wash and gets everything off your face.

I like that it did not leave my skin feeling tight and gave me a nice glow on its own. This product is definitely worth purchasing.

reviews.headline: Nice, Gentle Cleanser
reviews.comments:
I received this cleanser for free in exchange for my honest review.

I have normal skin, and this cleanser worked well for me. The texture is nice- it goes on as a cream and then turns into a foam. It doesn't get super foamy, but enough to feel like it's doing the job. It felt gentle on my skin, not drying or harsh at all. The scent was pleasant, but not overly fragranced. 

Overall, it's a solid everyday cleanser that leaves my skin feeling good.

reviews.headline: Thick, foamy, and Effective
reviews.comments: La Mousse has very thoughtful packaging, that rests on a stable cap, with the opening downward. The cream has a thickness similar to toothpaste, but the texture of a concentrated lotion. A pea-sized amount is adequate given how readily La Mousse foams upon the application of water. With twice daily use, I have a sensation of long-lasting moisturization, followed by cleanliness and refreshment (thanks to camellia petals). My skin doesn't feel irritated, dehydrated, or oily. I appreciate that the wide majority of the ingredients are naturally derived. I received this product in return for an honest review, but I recommend it due to its high quality and effectiveness.

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: OK, so I want to start off by saying that this you really only need a little bit as it goes a long way. I really like how much product is in this for the price I think it's definitely worth it. I usually double cleanse but with this sometimes I can just cleanse one time and everything comes off. I love the smell as it smells very fresh and clean. I will definitely be buying this again.

reviews.headline: I love this cleansing
reviews.comments:
This cream is very good.

Leave your skin very soft and clean for up to one week, its texture is very soft and it is ideal for the skin, it does not irritate, it contains camellia and ceramides that offers great comfort. 
I receive this product free by complimentary

reviews.headline: Luxurious feeling face wash
reviews.comments: I was given this face wash as a sample to try. I am so glad I did. Very creamy feel, a little bit goes a long way. Foams up right away, doesn't make your skin dry, very moisturizing. The smell is very pleasant. It definitely left my skin very soft. Just be careful to not get any in your eyes as it does burn. Other than that im very pleased with the product

reviews.headline: A cleanser thats actually reliable.
reviews.comments:
I received this #GiftFromChanel in exchange for my review.

I find most cleansers dont always finish the job they start but i want to open this by saying this gets it doen in one go. its reliable and refreshing tho my packaging couldve used some english instructions but luckily i can read french. If u want a cleanser that isnt going to leave you guessing if it works then this is what you're looking for.

reviews.headline: Exactly what it says.
reviews.comments: Product is creamy, easy to use and does everything it claims. Could it be more? Yes. Could they charge more? Yes. But they dont need to. Its a no nonsense reliable product that leaves u feeling clean and refreshed. Honestly more cleansing products should be so reliable.

reviews.headline: Luxurious feeling face wash
reviews.comments:
I received this La Mousse face wash by CHANEL for free in exchange for my honest thoughts on the product. 

To start off, I really liked the texture of La Mousse, it's really silky and smooth. For the most part I tend to use a more gel like face wash (I've been using Fresh's Soy Face Cleanser for the last year) but I really like the creaminess of La Mousse, and how nicely it foams up, and how nice it feels on my skin. While it wasn't drying at all, I definitely felt a sort of squeaky cleanness, I wouldn't skip the moisturizer.
 
I can't quite place the scent but it's very delicate, not overpowering or too fragrant.  I was also impressed by how well it took off my makeup, I didn't have to scrub too hard to get a bunch of excess off. 

Packing is simple but feels quality, but price tag is a little hefty for the amount you get. The plus side is that you don't have to use too much at a time so I'm hoping I can make it last. 

While I would recommend the product, I'm up in the air as to whether I would purchase it myself, it feels luxurious on the skin, and I think it's an effective product, but I'll have to see how long this bottle ends up lasting to see if it's really worth it.

reviews.headline: Super Fresh and Clean
reviews.comments: I loved using Chanel La Mousse facial cleanser- it is a very creamy cleanser.  Cleanser can be tricky, it can leave you dry.  This one didn't at all.  I do have sensitive skin so I was wondering if my skin would react to it - thankfully it did not.  Overall I would recommend this product! Pleasant scent as well! I did receive this free product in exchange for my review.

reviews.headline: Gentle Cleanser That Leaves Skin Fresh and Soft
reviews.comments:
This cleanser feels luxuriously creamy going on, I didn't think it foamed much but may try putting a little in a foam pump. 

My skin feels clean and free of oils, soft and refreshed after rinsing, not tight or dry. It takes off sunscreen and makeup residue easily (my wife), and a little goes a long way so the tube will last a while. I've also noticed my skin looks smoother and more balanced since using it daily. Overall this was a very pleasant product that I would purchase or recommend.

I received this product for free in exchange for writing this review.

reviews.headline: Gentle Cleanser That Leaves Skin Fresh and Soft
reviews.comments:
This cleanser feels luxuriously creamy going on, I didn't think it foamed much but may try putting a little in a foam pump. 

My skin feels clean and free of oils, soft and refreshed after rinsing, not tight or dry. It takes off sunscreen and makeup residue easily (my wife), and a little goes a long way so the tube will last a while. I've also noticed my skin looks smoother and more balanced since using it daily. Overall this was a very pleasant product that I would purchase or recommend.

reviews.headline: Fancy cleanser
reviews.comments: The bottle is very pretty and fancy. I like this cleanser because it leaves my skin clean and I have sensitive skin and it didn't cause any reaction or dried my skin. It has a really good scent but it kind of lingers after rinsing it, I usually notice it when I use it at night. It is an expensive cleanser but the bottle is big and you only need a tiny amount of product since it is very thick. I received this cleanser for free in exchange for writing a review.

reviews.headline: Excellent and efficient cleansing
reviews.comments: I received this product for free in exchange for writing the review. This cleanser has worked really well on my combination skin over the last few weeks, and has kept my skin clear and cleansed and has helped me maintain a nice balance to my face. A little bit goes a long way with this cleanser and just a pea size amount is enough to wash my face thoroughly. I've used this every other night for the past three weeks and it has been amazing.

reviews.headline: A little bit gives an amazing result
reviews.comments: This silky, creamy cleanser has a mild smell and cleans my skin really well. I noticed it gave my skin an even texture and made it squeaky clean., I  have been using it for a few weeks now and love how it deep cleans and removes all makeup and dirt. A little goes a long way, and since i am the only one using i am hoping this beautiful tube is going to last me for a while I absolutely love the packaging; it looks cute, and it is thoughtfully made.I have received it for free in exchange for a review

reviews.headline: Fresh, clean and soft skin
reviews.comments: This is my first time trying CHANEL La Mousse. The creamy soap creates a good amount of foam that makes the face feel pampered. I also love the refreshing light scent of the soap. It is very easy to rinse and leave the skin soft and supple. Highly recommend!!!

reviews.headline: Leaves your face so fresh feeling!
reviews.comments: Love this product! It foams up so nice with minimal product and makes my face feel so smooth. I love that it smells clean, without overpowering scent. Did not break out my sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: I would buy this
reviews.comments: Soft and gentle cream- cleans the face of makeup and oils

reviews.headline: creamy, luxurious & soft skin
reviews.comments: I recently tried the Chanel Foam Cleanser, and what a truly luxurious experience. The texture is creamy and it creates a foamy lather with a light and fresh scent.  I really love how my skin feels clean yet surprisingly soft afterwards.  While this product might be a bit expensive for a foam cleanser, it's definitely worth splurging if you are looking for a product that cleanses but leaves the skin soft after cleansing.  I received this complimentary product in exchange for my honest review.

media.headline: I have sensitive skin and I love it
media.caption: Very good

faceoff_positive.comments:
My skin is very sensitive, so I'm always cautious when trying new products — especially foaming cleansers. Most of them tend to leave my skin feeling tight, dry, or irritated. But after using Chanel LA MOUSSE for just three days, I can already tell this one is different — in the best way.

The texture starts off creamy, and when mixed with water it transforms into a soft, luxurious foam that glides over the skin. It feels silky, not harsh or stripping, and it rinses off completely clean. My skin feels calm, soft, and so refreshed afterward — no dryness or redness at all.

And I have to say, the scent is absolutely divine. Light, elegant, and fresh — it makes me feel like I'm having a mini spa moment right at my sink. It's such a beautiful, relaxing part of my routine, and I actually look forward to using it.

Just to be transparent: I received this product for free in exchange for writing this review, but everything I'm sharing is based on my honest experience after using it for three days. And so far? I'm really impressed.

The texture of my skin already feels smoother and more balanced, which is rare for me to notice so quickly with any skincare product. A little goes a long way too — you only need a small amount to get a rich lather, so it feels like it'll last.

Even after just a few days, I can see myself buying this when I run out. I've already told a friend with rosacea and another with dry skin to check it out, because I think it's one of those rare cleansers that actually delivers on gentleness and effectiveness.

It's not just a cleanser — it's a small, luxurious moment of calm that really makes a difference in how my skin feels. And for someone with reactive, sensitive skin like mine, that's no small thing.
faceoff_positive.headline: A Gentle Cleanser That Feels Like a Daily Spa Moment

faceoff_negative.comments: I recently incorporated Chanel La Mousse into my double cleansing routine and, while there were some positives, it just wasn't a good match for me. The texture of this cleanser is creamy and it lathers well, leaving my skin feeling very clean. A little goes a long way, and the packaging is sleek and elegant, as I think is expected from a brand like Chanel. It does have a slight scent that wasn't bothersome for me, but might be deal breaker for people who are more sensitive to scented products. While it felt great during cleansing, I did experience a minor breakout on my chin after a few uses, which isn't typical for me. My skin also felt noticeably tight afterward and I developed some dry patches around my nose. While it might work well for those with oilier skin types, it may be a bit too drying or reactive for more sensitive or combination skin. Overall, it's a luxurious product, but it just didn't quite suit my skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not a good fit for me
